CCSC.default_style: {{num|wrap(']')|add_chars(' ') if num else ''}}{{author|authors_ccsc() if author else '' }}{% if title is defined and author is defined %}{{title|add_chars('.')|add_to_front(', ')}}{% elif title is defined %}{{title|add_chars('.')}}{% else %}{{'.'}}{% endif %}

journal.template: {{num|wrap(']')|add_chars(' ') if num else ''}}{{author|authors_ccsc() if author else '' }}{{title|add_chars(', ') if title else '' }}{{journal|wrap_html('i')|add_chars(', ') if journal else ''}}{{volume|add_chars(', ') if volume else '' }}{{issue|wrap(')')|add_chars(', ') if issue else ''}}{{pages if pages else ''}}{% if pages is defined and year is defined %}{{year|add_chars('.')|add_to_front(', ')}}{% elif year is defined %}{{year|add_chars('.')}}{% else %}{{'.'}}{% endif %}

book.template: {{num|wrap(']')|add_chars(' ') if num else ''}}{{author|authors_ccsc() if author else '' }}{{title|wrap_html('i')|add_chars(', ') if title else '' }}{{city|add_chars(': ') if city else ''}}{{publisher if publisher else '' }}{% if publisher is defined and year is defined %}{{year|add_chars('.')|add_to_front(', ')}}{% elif year is defined %}{{year|add_chars('.')}}{% else %}{{'.'}}{% endif %}

internet.template: {{num|wrap(']')|add_chars(' ') if num else ''}}{{author|authors_ccsc() if author else '' }}{{title|wrap_html('i')|add_chars(', ') if title else '' }}{{year|add_chars(', ') if year else ''}}{{url if url else ''}}{% if url is defined and retrieved is defined %}{{retrieved|add_chars('.')|add_to_front(', retrieved ')}}{% elif retrieved is defined %}{{year|add_to_front('retrieved ')|add_chars('.')}}{% else %}{{'.'}}{% endif %}

ACM.default_style: {{num|add_chars('. ') if num else ''}}{{author|authors_acm() if author else '' }}{{editor|authors_acm() if editor else '' }}{{title|add_chars('. ') if title else '' }}{{publisher|add_chars(', ') if publisher else '' }}{{city if city else ''}}{% if city is defined and year is defined %}{{year|add_chars('.')|add_to_front(', ')}}{% elif year is defined %}{{year|add_chars('.')}}{% else %}{{'.'}}{% endif %}

book.template: {{num|add_chars('. ') if num else ''}}{{author|authors_acm() if author else '' }}{{title|add_chars('. ') if title else '' }}{{publisher|add_chars(', ') if publisher else '' }}{{city if city else ''}}{% if city is defined and year is defined %}{{year|add_chars('.')|add_to_front(', ')}}{% elif year is defined %}{{year|add_chars('.')}}{% else %}{{'.'}}{% endif %}

inbook.template: {{num|add_chars('. ') if num else ''}}{{author|authors_acm() if author else '' }}{{title|add_chars('. ') if title else '' }}{{editor|authors_acm()|add_to_front('in ') if editor else '' }}{{edit_title|wrap_html('i')|add_chars(', ') if edit_title else '' }}{{publisher|add_chars(', ') if publisher else '' }}{{city|add_chars(', ') if city else ''}}{{year|add_chars(', ') if year else ''}}{% if pages is defined and year is defined %}{{pages|add_chars('.')|add_to_front(', ')}}{% elif pages is defined %}{{pages|add_chars('.')}}{% else %}{{'.'}}{% endif %}

conference.template: {{num|add_chars('. ') if num else ''}}{{author|authors_acm() if author else '' }}{{title|add_chars('. ') if title else '' }}{{title_conference|wrap_html('i')|add_to_front('in ')|add_chars(', ') if title_conference else '' }}{{location|add_chars(', ')|add_to_front('(') if location and year else '' }}{{location|wrap(')')|add_chars(', ') if location and not year else '' }}{{year|add_chars('), ') if year and location else ''}}{{year|wrap(')')|add_chars(', ') if year and not location else ''}}{{publisher if publisher else '' }}{% if pages is defined and publisher is defined %}{{pages|add_chars('.')|add_to_front(', ')}}{% elif pages is defined %}{{pages|add_chars('.')}}{% else %}{{'.'}}{% endif %}

journal.template: {{num|add_chars('. ') if num else ''}}{{author|authors_acm() if author else '' }}{{title|add_chars('. ') if title else '' }}{{journal|wrap_html('i')|add_chars(', ') if journal else '' }}{{volume|add_chars(' ') if volume and issue else '' }}{{volume|add_chars(', ') if volume and not issue else '' }}{{issue|wrap(')') if issue else '' }}{% if issue is defined and pages is defined %}{{pages|add_chars('.')|add_to_front(', ')}}{% elif pages is defined %}{{pages|add_chars('.')}}{% else %}{{'.'}}{% endif %}

internet.template: {{num|add_chars('. ') if num else ''}}{{author|authors_acm() if author else '' }}{{title|add_chars('. ') if title else '' }}{{journal|wrap_html('i')|add_chars(', ') if journal else '' }}{{volume|add_chars(' ') if volume and issue else '' }}{{volume|add_chars(', ') if volume and not issue else '' }}{{issue|wrap(')')|add_chars(', ') if issue else '' }}{{retrieved|add_to_front('Retrieved ')|add_chars(', ') if retrieved else ''}}{{source|add_to_front('from ') if source else ''}}{% if url is defined and source is defined %}{{url|add_chars('.')|add_to_front(': ')}}{% elif url is defined %}{{url|add_chars('.')}}{% else %}{{'.'}}{% endif %}

in_text_style.template: {{author|get_last()|add_chars(', ')|add_to_front('(') if author and year else ''}}{{author|wrap(')') if author and not year else ''}}{{year|add_chars(')') if year and author else ''}}{{year|wrap(')') if year and not author else ''}}

APA.default_style: {{author|authors_apa() if author else '' }}{{year|wrap(')')|add_chars('. ') if year else ''}}{{title|wrap_html('i')|add_chars('. lecture.template: {{author|authors_apa() if author else '' }}{{year|wrap(')')|add_chars('. ') if year else ''}}{{title|add_chars(' ') if title and format else ''}}{{title|add_chars('. ') if title and not format else ''}}{{format|wrap(']')|add_chars('.') if format else ''}}{{url|add_to_front(' Retrieved from ') if url else '.'}}

broadcast.template: {{author|authors_apa() if author else '' }}{{year|wrap(')')|add_chars('. ') if year else ''}}{{title|add_chars(' [Broadcast]. ') if title else ''}}{{producer|add_to_front('In Executive Producer, ')|add_chars(', ') if producer else ''}}{{series|wrap_html('i')|add_chars('. ') if series else ''}}{{city|add_chars(', ') if city and state else ''}}{{city|add_chars(': ') if city and channel and not state else '' }}{{city|add_chars('.') if city and not channel and not state else '' }}{{state|add_chars(': ') if state and channel else '' }}{{state|add_chars('.') if state and not channel else ''}}{{channel|add_chars('.') if channel else ''}}

') if title else ''}}{{booktitle|wrap_html('i')|add_to_front('In ')|add_chars(', ') if booktitle else ''}}{{volume|add_chars(', ')|add_to_front('(') if pages and volume else ''}}{{volume|wrap(')')|add_chars('. ') if volume and not pages else ''}}{{pages|add_chars('). ') if volume and pages else ''}}{{pages|wrap(')')|add_chars('. ') if pages and not volume else ''}}{{city|add_chars(', ') if city and state else ''}}{{city|add_chars(': ') if city and publisher and not state else '' }}{{city|add_chars('.') if city and not publisher and not state else '' }}{{state|add_chars(': ') if state and publisher else '' }}{{state|add_chars('.') if state and not publisher else ''}}{{publisher|add_chars('.') if publisher else ''}}

') if year and not month else ''}}{{month|add_chars('). ') if year and month else ''}}{{month|wrap(')')|add_chars('. ') if month and not year else ''}}{{title|wrap_html('i')|add_chars(' [Photograph]. ') if title else ''}}{{city|add_chars(', ') if city and state else ''}}{{city|add_chars(': ') if city and publisher and not state else '' }}{{city|add_chars('.') if city and not publisher and not state else '' }}{{state|add_chars(': ') if state and publisher else '' }}{{state|add_chars('.') if state and not publisher else ''}}{{publisher|add_chars('.') if publisher else ''}}
